Package cz.cuni.mff.java.klima.pacman.entities.characters.enemies

Class Enemy

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.cuni.mff.java.klima.pacman.entities.Entity
      • cz.cuni.mff.java.klima.pacman.entities.characters.Moving
        • cz.cuni.mff.java.klima.pacman.entities.characters.enemies.Enemy
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    EnemyPink, EnemyPurple, EnemyRed, EnemyYellow
    public abstract class Enemy
extends Moving
    Enemy is an abstract class for all different types of ghosts present in the game.

    Each type of ghost has different behaviour regarding his movements in chase and scatter modes. All share the same behaviour, when in blue-ghosts mode or dead mode.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Enemy

        Enemy​(Handler handler,
      float x,
      float y)
        Constructor of abstract enemy class always called by all ghosts present in game. It takes the game handler for having access to the game map and its elements, an x-coordinate and a y-coordinate, which are both absolute in pixels, rather than in map tiles.

        It also sets local variables, such as random number generator, x and y-coordinates in map tiles and the bounding rectangle.

        Parameters:
        handler - game handler for accessing other elements of the game
        x - absolute x-coordinate in pixels
        y - absolute y-coordinate in pixels

    • Method Detail

      • move

        public void move()
        Enemies' implementation of general move method which is abstract in Moving class. Checks for collision with PacMan and handles its consequences, if there are any.
        Specified by:
        move in class Moving

      • moveX

        public void moveX()
        Description copied from class: Moving
        Sets the x-coordinate for moved entity. It makes no changes, when xMove is 0.
        Specified by:
        moveX in class Moving

      • moveY

        public void moveY()
        Description copied from class: Moving
        Sets the y-coordinate for moved entity. It makes no changes, when yMove is 0.
        Specified by:
        moveY in class Moving

      • moveChase

        void moveChase()
        Basic action when moving in chase mode. It sets the enemy's coordinates to new ones.

      • moveScatter

        void moveScatter()
        Basic action when moving in scatter mode. It sets the enemy's coordinates to new ones.

      • flipOrientation

        public void flipOrientation()
        Immediately flips the enemy's orientation. This method is called whenever there is a change in enemies' movement mode, for example from chase to scatter or from blue ghosts to chase.

      • distance

        double distance​(int x1,
                int y1,
                int x2,
                int y2)
        Gets euclidean distance between two tiles.
        Parameters:
        x1 - x-coordinate of first tile
        y1 - y-coordinate of first tile
        x2 - x-coordinate of second tile
        y2 - y-coordinate of second tile
        Returns:
        euclidean distance between the two tiles

        Chooses which calculation of next enemy move should be done and calls it.

      • notImmuneToBlue

        public boolean notImmuneToBlue()
        Gets immunity status of enemy.
        Returns:
